title: SysFileWrite (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SysFileWrite : __XWORD
Write number of bytes to the file. File must be opened with
AM_WRITE
or
AM_APPEND
.

rows.Name: SysFileWrite
rows.Comment: Number of bytes written to the file. 0=if failed

rows: Pointer to buffer with data to write to file

Number of bytes to write in the file. Must be less or equal
the buffer size!
Pointer to runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)
